Introduction
============

Most documentation of omicron processing is available online.


.. list-table:: Documentation
    :header-rows: 1

    * - Document (type)
      - Link
    * - HTML user's manual if omicron gap utilities (this project)
      - https://o4-dqr.docs.ligo.org/o4-dqr-configuration/index.html
    * - Pyomicron -
      - https://pyomicron.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
    * - Omicron online admin notes (wiki)
      - https://wiki.ligo.org/DetChar/OmicronOnlineAdmin#Update_the_channel_lists
